reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweatshirt well-made and comfortable, with a design that looks like a Flamepoint Siamese cat and performs well at ugly sweater parties. The fit is great, and they appreciate its warmth, with one customer noting it can be worn indoors without overheating. The material receives mixed feedback - while some find it soft, others describe it as a slick polyester type material. Customers disagree on the s

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this hoodie
items.body: I love this hoodie so much! Very warm and soft on the inside, and the outside is spandex but I love it because I can move around and it'd not tight. I want to order more like this one now .The graphics are really good quality , I have had a lot of compliments and people saying they love my hoodie and asking where I got it, well worth the purchase. Read more
items.author: vanessa brooks

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars ðŸŽ„ Perfectly Festive and Super Comfy!
items.body: I got this Gloria&Sarah Ugly Christmas Sweater sweatshirt for our familyâ€™s â€œugly Christmas sweaterâ€ photo, and it was absolutely perfect! The design is bold, funny, and exactly what you want for a festive, over-the-top holiday look. It photographed really well, and everyone loved it. The material is surprisingly soft and comfortable not stiff or scratchy like some novelty sweaters can be. It has a lightweight sweatshirt feel, so you can wear it indoors without overheating. The fit was true to size, and the colors were vibrant right out of the package. Overall, this sweatshirt did exactly what I needed it to do: stand out, make people laugh, and keep me comfy through the whole family photo session. If youâ€™re looking for something fun and easy to wear for holiday parties, pictures, or work events, this one is a great pick! Read more
items.author: ðŸ›’ Shopperazzi | Mom of 3 | Full-time chaos coordinator, part-time deal hunter

items.author: AnthonyPinup

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this hoodie!
items.body: I love that itâ€™s an ugly sweater â€œlookingâ€ hoodie. No one wants to wear actual sweaters. In this day and age we have superior materials and yarn makes you itch so this is a win win. Being that you likely bought this to go to a party, this hoodie is the prefect thickness which will keep you comfortable and not too warm. The inside is very soft and comfortable. The fit is great and very tru to size! Read more
items.author: David Matthews

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Ugly Christmas sweater for the price. Quality
items.body: This is the ugliest ugly christmas sweater I've seen. For the price, this hoodie is so worth it. Even if it didn't have christmas, I would buy this just normally. I love the fabric, size, (I ordered this up a size to put it over other clothes- and it's PLENTY big.) It's long so it does drape the hips. But the fabric is stretchy even if it didn't. It feels so good on, I didn't take off the ugliness. I hate cats, by the way. That made it all the uglier. I haven't yet washed it so i'm not sure on the laundering. If I win the contest, that would be even better! Great product! Read more
items.author: L. Hall

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality sweatshirt
items.body: Very happy with this. Exactly what I thought it would be. Not too heavy and the material and softer and more durable than I expected. I was looking for something to wear under a flannel and this is exactly it. It is a little long but but not too bad at all. I did buy a XXL!! Read more
items.author: Clint

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Beware of sizing
items.body: I ordered a 2X, and it fits my 13-year-old daughter. I have no idea what size they think 2X is. Thankfully, she loves gremlins so now itâ€™s hers and Iâ€™m stuck looking for something the day that I needed it. Read more
items.author: Jimi Donnells

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Movie Star, Tumblenight, Goofytree, Cat, Snow Santa Claus, Elf, Green Elf, Meowing. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
